<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get a external transfer"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/transfer/external/{pactualId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This method is called to get a single external payment instance by passing the pactualId of the target payment as a parameter.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
